name: The Huggen
description:
Note: If you are experiencing frame rate issues with the game, we recommend downloading the game.

This game is a heart-wrenching tale of a lonely kraken, and its ongoing attempts to find companionship and love in a cold, heartless world.

Controls: 

  •  Q: Move left tentacle up
  •  W: Move left tentacle in
  •  O: Move right tentacle in
  •  P: Move right tentacle up

Credits: 

  •  Programming: Orbitoid
  •  Music: Daverinoe
  •  Art: velopman
